name: Attack of the Killer Klown Balor Skeletons
name_original: Attack of the Killer Klown Balor Skeletons
description:
A short text adventure game where nothing happens. Features:

  • Get robbed by a coffee shop owner!
  • Die to a clown titan!
  • Be evicted!
  • Spill coffee on your leg!
  • Get robbed!

And much more!
